title: gOvindarAjAya namastE
sahitya:
gOvindarAjAya namastE namastE shrI


anupallavi

 gOvardhana giridharAya gOpastrI manOharAya


caraNam   dEvakI sukumArAya dInArtti bhanjanAya dEvarAja pUjitAya dEshikanuta varadAya 
dEva kanaka sabhEsha hitAya guruguha nutAya vAsavAdi vanditAya vasuprada nipuNatarAya
